translation: Facts beat eloquence.
A team of horses will struggle to chase down a spoken word.

chinese: 路遥知马力，日久见人心。
translation: As distance tests a horse's strength, time reveals a person's character.
Without standards, no boundaries are set.
Punishing those who come before stops those who come after from doing something.
Think thrice before you act.
Good medicine tastes bitter.

chinese: 有理走遍天下，无理寸步难行。
translation: With truth on your side, you can go anywhere; without truth, you can't take a tiny step.
The player is lost; the watcher is lucid.
Ten years to cultivate wood, a hundred years to cultivate a man.
Food is the first priority of the people.
Repay good with good.
Deliberately vague and deflective.
While some are happy, some are anxious.
A person leaves a reputation, as a swallow leaves its call.
Everything's ready except the east wind.
Small as it is, the sparrow has all the vital organs.
Guilin's scenery's best on earth.
When a mute eats dumplings, he knows how many he has eaten.
A happy occasion gladdens the spirit.
Two benefits from one action.
Like sitting on a carpet of needles.
When adversity comes, receive it favorably.
Replace weapons with jade and silk.
This ground doesn't have 300 taels of silver.
Soldiers don't hate deceit.

chinese: 木已成舟，生米煮成熟饭。
translation: The timber's already a boat; the rice is cooked.
A body acts according to physical strength.
Great wisdom can seem foolish.
The quick-footed climb first.
Love at first sight.

chinese: 愿得一人心，白首不相离。
translation: Long for a heart, never be apart.
Hold hands with you, grow old with you.
Love isn't about having, it's about enjoying (what you have).
Love the house and its crow.
Radishes and greens, each has those who love them.

chinese: 在天愿作比翼鸟，在地愿为连理枝。
translation: Birds flying in the sky as one; branches growing on the earth as one.
People in love become spouses in the end.
In a lover's eye is the foremost Beauty.

chinese: 有情饮水饱，无情食饭饥。
translation: With love water is enough; without love, food doesn't satisfy.
It takes more than one cold day for a river to freeze a meter deep.
Don't miss opportunities: time doesn't come round again.
When people work with one heart, they can even move Mount. Tai.
All things are difficult at the start.
Failure is the mother of success.

chinese: 只要功夫深，铁杵磨成针。
translation: It just needs hard work to grind an iron rod into a needle.
Water drops pierce stone; rope saws cut wood.
A day's planning is done at dawn.
A thousand-li journey starts with a footfall.
Peace replaces extreme evil.
Green is from blue, and better than blue.
An old warhorse in the stable still longs to gallop a thousand li.

chinese: 吃得苦中苦，方为人上人。
translation: Enduring deepening pain is how man ascends.
The first to arrive is the first to succeed.
Watch till clouds part to see the moonlight.
Adversity yields flair.
Suffer a moat, grow in wisdom.
You can't get fat with one mouthful.
Wind isn't always favorable; soldiers aren't always victorious.
Starlight shines far.
An aggrieved army is sure to win.
If you don't do stupid things you won't end up in tragedy.
Blessings come in disguise.
If small holes aren't fixed, then big holes will bring hardship.
Water flows in only to flow out.

chinese: 读万卷书不如行万里路。
translation: It's better to walk thousands of miles than to read thousands of books.
Too many cooks spoil the broth.
A smile dispels many worries.
Happiness is the best cosmetic.
A good name is better than a good face.
A bad beginning makes a bad ending.
Keep the general goal in sight while tackling daily tasks.
Every step makes a footprint.
Each has his own task, and nobody is dispensable.

chinese: 留得青山在，不怕没柴烧。
translation: While there are green hills, there'll be wood to burn.

chinese: 一鸟在手胜过双鸟在林。
translation: A bird in the hand is worth two in the bush.
No man is a perfect man; no gold is sufficiently bare.

chinese: 千军易得, 一将难求。
translation: It is easy to find a thousand soldiers, but hard to find a good general.
A prime minister's mind should be broad enough for polling a boat.
Ignorance is bliss.
Disaster comes from the careless talk.

chinese: 三人一条心，黄土变成金。
translation: If people are of one heart, even loess can become gold.
One who stands straight doesn't fear a crooked shadow.
Timely return of a loan makes it easier to borrow a second time.

chinese: 蜡烛照亮别人，却毁灭了自己。
translation: A candle lights others and consumes itself.

chinese: 种瓜得瓜, 种豆得豆。
translation: You reap what you sow.
Those who just want speed don't succeed.

chinese: 近水知鱼性, 近山识鸟音。
translation: To know a fish go to the water; to know a bird's song go to the mountains.

chinese: 听君一席话，胜读十年书。
translation: Listening to a lord's remarks is better than reading books for ten years.

chinese: 凡人不可貌相, 海水不可斗量。 (Fánrén bù kě màoxiàng, hǎishuǐ bù kě dòuliàng / 'mortals can't judge by appearance, sea water can't cup measure') — Man cannot be judged by looks; seas cannot be measured by the cup.
translation: In short: "don't judge by appearances".
Fate brings people together from far apart.
A gentleman's friendship is insipid as water.
When entering a locality follow the local customs.
In hardship, we see true friendship.
An intimate friend is hard to find.
Numerous friends means no deep friendship.
Men of different principles don't work well together.

chinese: 月到中秋分外明，每逢佳节倍思亲。
translation: The harvest moon is brightest; every festival's homesickness multiplies.
When children travel far, mothers worry.

chinese: 但愿人长久，千里共婵娟。
translation: Wishing us long life, though sharing moonlight from afar.
If a family is harmonious everything will go well.
Every family has its problems.
Even an upright official finds it hard to settle a family quarrel.
Where there's a father, there's his son.
Family shames must not be spread abroad.
If you don't run the family, you don't know the value of fuel and rice.

chinese: 金窝，银窝，不如自家的狗窝。
translation: Gold and silver nests can't beat one's family kennel.
A book is a pocket garden.
Live till you're old, and study till you're old.
A good book is like a good friend.

chinese: 一寸光阴一寸金，寸金难买寸光阴。
translation: An inch of time is worth an inch of gold, but an inch of gold may not buy an inch of time.
A good memory can't beat a bad pen.

chinese: 花有重开日，人无再少年。
translation: Flowers may bloom again; you're never young again.

chinese: 学而不思则罔，思而不学则殆。
translation: Learning without thought is deceptive; thought without learning is perilous.
When using books, you'll regret reading few.

chinese: 读书须用意，一字值千金。
translation: Reading requires concentration; a word may be worth a fortune.
Strict teachers produce fine students.
The dragonflies and the phoenix dances.
A dragon's and a horse's spirit.
A muddled mix of fish and dragons.
Dragons soaring and tigers leaping.
Carriages like a stream and horses like a dragon.
A dragon's pool and a tiger's den.
Paint a dragon and dot the eye.
Lord Ye loves dragons.
A carp has jumped the dragon's gate.
Even a dragon struggles to control a snake in its native haunt.
